title: Can International Armys write letters to BTS? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can, but as you know that BTS and Big Hit Entertainment have made the decision to no longer accept fan gifts(apart from letters) to be sent on their fanmail address after 30th May 2018. But still yes, you can send a letters but not packages. BTS Fanmail — US BTS ARMY. After careful consideration and thorough discussion, BigHit Entertainment and BTS have decided to NOT receive any more gifts (delivery service & support) as of March 30, 2018. Go to my Profile and you can find all about BTS and ARMY material there...

Of Course they can. You can send fan mail to BTS. However, you may never know if they can actually read it or not.  This is as of 2017. So please be careful if you are going to send an fan letters or fan mail.
